repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:3.1.3

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY . /usr/src/app
RUN bundle install

EXPOSE 9292

ENTRYPOINT ["rackup", "--host", "0.0.0.0"]
